entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support tests sharding natively #42986
  • Support one more targets file which will be evaluated immediately after project file but before targets files from NuGet packages. #42970
  • error MSB3030: (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Could not copy the file #42964
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963

Closed

  • Extend the `dotnet run` command discovery protocol to be settable by a Target instead of just Evaluation #42155
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue on Ubuntu24.04 #40506
  • DisableTransitiveProjectReferences does not appear to work #42947

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Put binlog directly into the VMR's #42984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net10.0 known framework references #42969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --source for global/path tool install #42965
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Tool install cleanup #42962
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Merged

  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
    Document for new feature
  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Disable fingerprinting in the VanillaWasm test #42918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Remove longstanding comment from C# console template #42497
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
